olac.title: Ritonõpo Omiry: Apalaí Ne Apalaí New Testament
olac.creator: Wycliffe Bible Translators
olac.description: This is the New Testament translated into Apalaí, titled "Ritonõpo Omiry". It was produced by Wycliffe Bible Translators and printed by the Digital Bible Society for non-commercial use.
olac.rights: This Bible is copyrighted by Wycliffe Bible Translators (Wycliffe.org) and printed with permission by the Digital Bible Society (dbs.org) for non-commercial use.
olac.subject: New Testament translation

olac.title: Ritonõpo Omiry: Apalaí Ne Apalaí New Testament
olac.creator: Koehn, Edward H.; Koehn, Sally S.
olac.description: This is a preliminary edition of the Apalaí New Testament interlinear text, prepared by Edward H. Koehn and Sally S. Koehn. It is part of the Arquivo Lingüístico series and consists of 260 pages of interlinearized texts.
olac.subject: Apalaí
Interlinearized Text
Language Texts
olac.rights: Not available online. Copyright © 1994 Instituto Lingüístico (SIL).
olac.relation: Is part of series: Arquivo Lingüístico
